# The `SmartMutex` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/smartmutex">SmartMutex</a> - A mutex with a compile time constant parameter that indicates whether this mutex should become a no-op when we&#39;re not running in multithreaded mode. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;bool mt&#95;only&gt;
class llvm::sys::SmartMutex&lt;mt&#95;only&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/smartmutex">SmartMutex</a> - A mutex with a compile time constant parameter that indicates whether this mutex should become a no-op when we&#39;re not running in multithreaded mode.
